originalService.rawText: Service A - Comprehensive Inspection - Quarterly preventive maintenance including all systems check

mappings.mappedDescription: Complete system inspection including engine, cooling, electrical, fuel, and exhaust systems

laborEstimate.basis: Standard Service A inspection protocol for 251-400kW range (avg)

pricingEstimate.basis: Energen Service A pricing for kW range 251-400, prevailing wage rates applied

mappings.mappingNotes: Perfect match. Service A is core offering, quarterly frequency confirmed, high keyword overlap.

originalService.rawText: Service B - Oil & Filter Service - Quarterly oil change, oil filter, fuel filter replacement

mappings.mappedDescription: Engine oil change, oil filter replacement, fuel filter replacement

laborEstimate.basis: Standard Service B oil change protocol

pricingEstimate.basis: Energen Service B pricing with parts (oil, filters) for 251-400kW range

mappings.mappingNotes: Excellent match. Service B is standard oil change service, exact keyword match for oil and filters.
mappings.specialNote: RFP specifies quarterly frequency for Service B, which is higher than typical annual Service B. Confirms quarterly combined A+B visits.

originalService.rawText: Service C - Coolant Service - Annual coolant system flush and refill with OEM-approved coolant

mappings.mappedDescription: Coolant system flush and refill with OEM-approved coolant

laborEstimate.basis: Standard Service C coolant flush protocol

pricingEstimate.basis: Energen Service C pricing including coolant (5-10 gallons avg), prevailing wage labor

mappings.mappingNotes: Strong match. Service C is standard coolant service offering. Annual frequency confirmed.

originalService.rawText: Service D - Laboratory Analysis - Annual oil analysis, fuel analysis, and coolant analysis with lab testing

mappings.mappedDescription: Laboratory testing of oil, fuel, and coolant samples with comprehensive analysis report

laborEstimate.basis: Service D is sample collection (15-30 min), lab does analysis

pricingEstimate.basis: Lab analysis fees $100-150 per sample, minimal labor for sample collection
pricingEstimate.note: Service D is primarily lab fees (parts), not labor-intensive, so prevailing wage impact minimal

mappings.mappingNotes: Good match. Service D maps to oil/fuel/coolant laboratory analysis. Low labor component (sample collection only).
mappings.specialNote: Service D has minimal labor (sample collection). Can be bundled with Service C coolant service visit to reduce mobilization costs.

originalService.rawText: Service E - Load Bank Testing - Annual 2-hour full load testing with load bank equipment to verify generator performance at rated capacity

mappings.mappedDescription: Full load testing using portable load bank equipment to verify generator performance and capacity

pricingEstimate.basis: Energen Service E pricing with load bank rental, fuel consumption, prevailing wage labor

mappings.mappingNotes: Excellent match. Service E is standard load bank testing service. RFP specifies 2-hour test duration which aligns with standard protocol.
mappings.specialNote: 2000kW generator load bank testing requires specialized equipment rental. May need to schedule separately from other units.

additionalServicesAvailable.name: F-Engine Tune-Up Diesel
additionalServicesAvailable.description: Diesel engine injector service and tune-up
additionalServicesAvailable.reason: Not requested in RFP but available if needed
additionalServicesAvailable.applicability: Could be offered as optional/additional service for diesel generators

additionalServicesAvailable.name: G-Gas Engine Tune-Up
additionalServicesAvailable.description: Natural gas engine spark plug and ignition service
additionalServicesAvailable.reason: Not requested in RFP, no natural gas generators in fleet
additionalServicesAvailable.applicability: Not applicable - all generators are diesel

additionalServicesAvailable.name: H-Generator Electrical Testing
additionalServicesAvailable.reason: Not requested in RFP but recommended for older generators
additionalServicesAvailable.applicability: Could be offered as optional add-on for generators >10 years old

additionalServicesAvailable.name: I-Transfer Switch Service
additionalServicesAvailable.description: Automatic transfer switch maintenance and testing
additionalServicesAvailable.applicability: Unknown if ATS maintenance is included in building electrical contracts

additionalServicesAvailable.name: J-Thermal Imaging Scan
additionalServicesAvailable.description: Infrared thermal imaging scan of electrical connections
additionalServicesAvailable.reason: Not requested in RFP but valuable preventive diagnostic
additionalServicesAvailable.applicability: Could be offered as optional value-add service

additionalServicesAvailable.name: K-Custom Service
additionalServicesAvailable.reason: Not explicitly requested but typically needed
additionalServicesAvailable.applicability: Include in proposal as hourly rate for additional work outside scope

benefits: Single site visit for both services reduces mobilization costs
35% mobilization stacking discount already applied in pricing
Combine all annual services into single extended visit
Share mobilization costs across three services
Efficient use of technician time on-site
recommendedBundling.recommendedScheduling: Q2 or Q3 to avoid overlap with quarterly PM

grandTotal.crewRequirement: 2-person crew, 1 day per quarter + 1 week annually

totalPricingEstimate.basis: All pricing includes prevailing wage labor rates, parts, mobilization, and sales tax on parts only (tax-exempt services)

notes: All 5 requested services map cleanly to existing Energen service offerings (A, B, C, D, E)
Service B quarterly frequency is higher than typical annual - confirms combined quarterly A+B visits
No custom or non-standard services requested - reduces risk and complexity
Service D (analysis) has minimal labor component - primarily lab fees
Service E (load bank) for 2000kW generator may require specialty equipment rental
Total annual hours (332.5) is manageable with dedicated 2-person crew
recommendations: Bundle Services A+B for quarterly visits to maximize efficiency
Schedule Services C+D+E as single annual extended visit (combine with Q2 or Q3 PM)
Apply 35% mobilization stacking discount for bundled quarterly services
Price 2000kW load bank test separately due to specialty equipment requirements
Consider offering Services H, J, K as optional add-ons to increase contract value
Highlight value-adds in proposal: advanced diagnostics, detailed reporting, emergency support
